name: Train juggler
description:
Have you been ever wondered why your real train was too late or didn't arrive?

Try then this simulator on top down view where you try to handle switches and train speeds.
There are 70 levels to master!


Minimum requirements:
- Windows XP or newer
- Display 960x600
- Processor 2.40 GHz
- Work memory 512 MB
- Disk space 10 MB
- Mouse + keyboard
